name: Sport Mode
description:
Successor to the hugely popular Physics Playground, Sport Mode takes it to the next level in a game where your creativity is the limit.

KEY FEATURES


  • Physics Driven - Realistic physics to create a visceral connection between you and the virtual world.
  • Creator Mode - A button press away from spawning and manipulating a variety of weapons, NPCs, and props.
  • Arena Mode - Fight off waves of enemies for the highest score.

COMING SOON


  • Puzzle Levels - Solve physics-driven puzzles in the fastest time possible.
  • Online Leaderboards - Compete with your friends with your high scores and fastest times.
  • Much More - New levels, weapons, tools, props, modifiers, and vehicles will be added over time.
